meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>family crest</kanji> on your <kanji>finger</kanji>? That's just your <vocabulary>fingerprint</vocabulary>. It can be used to identify you, so it's pretty much the same as your own personal family crest.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
